name: RSI Momentum Strategy
description: A momentum strategy using the Relative Strength Index (RSI) indicator. Buys when RSI indicates oversold conditions and sells when RSI indicates overbought conditions.
author: QuantLib

parameters.name: rsi_oversold
parameters.description: RSI threshold for oversold condition (buy signal)

parameters.name: rsi_overbought
parameters.description: RSI threshold for overbought condition (sell signal)

documentation: This strategy uses RSI to identify overbought and oversold conditions. RSI values below the oversold threshold indicate potential buying opportunities, while values above the overbought threshold suggest selling.
references: J. Welles Wilder, 'New Concepts in Technical Trading Systems'
